00081 class NT3D_color_o : public NT_o {
00082 public:
00083   NT3D_color_o();
00084   NT3D_color_o(GLfloat newR, GLfloat newG, GLfloat newB, GLfloat newAlpha);
00085   NT3D_color_o(const valarray<GLfloat> & newColorRGBA);
00086   //NT3D_color_o(const NT_vector_o & newColorRGBA);
00087   NT3D_color_o(const NT3D_color_o & original);
00088   const NT3D_color_o& operator= (const NT3D_color_o & right);
00089   ~NT3D_color_o();
00090   /*   Methods                */  
00091   virtual void Paint() const { glColor4fv(colorPtr);}
00092   void SetColor( GLfloat newR, GLfloat newG, GLfloat newB, GLfloat newAlpha);
00093   void SetColor( const GLfloat newColor[] );
00094   void SetColor( const NT3D_color_o & newColor);
00095   NTreal _R(){ return colorRGBA[0];}
00096   NTreal _G(){ return colorRGBA[1];}
00097   NTreal _B(){ return colorRGBA[2];}
00098   NTreal _Alpha(){ return colorRGBA[3];}
00099   NT3D_color_o operator+(const NT3D_color_o &right) const;
00100   NT3D_color_o operator-(const NT3D_color_o &right) const;
00101   NT3D_color_o operator*(NTreal alpha) const;
00102   /* return the pointer to the color Cache (for OpenGL draws) */
00103   const GLfloat * _colorPtr() {Update(); return (const GLfloat*) colorPtr;}
00104    /*   Data                   */  
00105 protected:
00106   /*   Methods                */
00107   /*   Data                   */
00108 private:
00109   /*   Methods                */  
00110   void Update();
00111   // 2DO implement range checking for input values
00112   /*   Data                   */
00113   valarray<GLfloat> colorRGBA;
00114   GLfloat* colorPtr;
00115 };
00116 
00117 extern NT3D_color_o& NT3D_alpha();
00118 extern NT3D_color_o& NT3D_white();
00119 extern NT3D_color_o& NT3D_red();
00120 extern NT3D_color_o& NT3D_green();
00121 extern NT3D_color_o& NT3D_blue();
00122 extern NT3D_color_o& NT3D_yellow();
00123 extern NT3D_color_o& NT3D_black();
